astrbot_plugin_batchrecall.author: Shell

astrbot_plugin_bulk_messages_shell.name: astrbot_plugin_bulk_messages_shell
astrbot_plugin_bulk_messages_shell.desc: 【仅QQ】支持群发机器人所在的所有群、指定群号群发、指定好友QQ号群发
astrbot_plugin_bulk_messages_shell.author: Shell

astrbot_plugin_help.name: astrbot_plugin_help

steam_status_monitor_shell.name: steam_status_monitor_shell

steam_status_monitor_shell.author: Shell

astrbot_plugin_zanwo_shell.name: astrbot_plugin_zanwo_shell
